content:
chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-04-19 #24210

Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.
I think I can simply remove the outParam in IsCharP that results in this adaptation note, in lean#8028.
No, I was wrong, grind does want this to be an outParam. I don't think switching off the warning in Mathlib is particularly problematic?
What if we make CharP use an outParam as well? That should be fine if all instances use primes or zero, right?
It seems to work as a semiOutParam: #24216
